title: Toasted marshmallow cupcakes
ingredients: ['200g plain flour', '300g caster sugar', '65g unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '3/4 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '180ml warm water', '2 large eggs, lightly beaten', '120ml whole milk', '75g unsalted butter, melted', '60g soured cream', '3/4 teaspoon pure vanilla extract', '12 large marshmallows']
